post.body: sounds like you're all set! good luck!
it was good - it's just like being back in high school - lots and lots of memorisation. definitely do the test exams to practice
are you taking the exam soon? i took it in august - i basically ended memorising the whole book!
they are but they're offering it to companies rather than going to the wider marketplace first
i think i've worked out the back end, but i also wanted to have some alternatives to drupal in my back pocket
thanks - with the bbc news blaring out at max volume, it just felt a little creepy
haha you're up late
congratulations! i'm sure my compatriots will treat you well!
that is brilliant - perfect afternoon timewasting fodder
well i'm still on orange but used my boyfriend's o2 access to get the tickets. best of both worlds and all that
i do - it's one of the most brilliant shows on telly!
strategically clusterfucked? lol that's one way of putting it :)
banner advertising done in a smart way can still create value - good creative and good buying can deliver ROI
income from banner advertising however shitty the banners are subsidises most websites and definitely aren't going anywhere soon
some of my clients would be interested in that - can you email to lbrothers@phdrocket.co.uk
we are - we've all got that christmas friday feeling & will be down the pub shortly!
that's good advice - thought of something a bit similar before a massive presentation yesterday
Chutzpah: For Those Who Are New To Recessions http://is.gd/bRrg
watching my new favourite indulgence - lipstick jungle
can anyone offer advice on a good open source cms besides drupal?
lots of people talking about passion as one of the business essentials for 2009
Weird celebrity sighting: liz from atomic kitten doing some serious shopping in woolies ladbroke grove
Amazed how it's possible to get almost any kind of service via t'internet these days
Up and at 'em at silly o'clock for the flight to dublin
Twisted Christmas at the Barbican was very twisted indeed
Dear TalkSport, why do you keep sending me your newsletter despite me already trying to unsubscribe four times?
just got blur ticket - woo hoo! thank you o2 priority!
wow i LOVE last minute requests just before i leave for christmas
Final client christmas dinner at lemonia - very cozy and lovely
Chutzpah: How Not To Target Emails http://is.gd/cXOf

Chutzpah: How Not To Target Emails http://is.gd/cXOf
Finally getting energy back after food poisoning - pizza, beer and oliver twist on the box
Up for most of the night with food poisoning- remind me never to eat at Yautacha again
My taxi driver has heard my obviously non-english accent and thinks he can get one over on me by taking me a very ridiculous route home
very cool photolayering update on google earth http://tinyurl.com/3u54lw
10am is definitely a good hour for some serious christmas electrodisco in the office

good news for one of my team - feeling really pleased for them
last massive presentation for the year is finished - now i can relax!
